name: Gnocchi With Wild Mushrooms
keywords: dry sherry, parmesan, pasta, porcini oil, potato gnocchi, shiitake, thyme, white mushrooms, wild mushrooms, main course
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the mushroom ragout and broth in a pan over medium heat and warm; stir in the porcini oil, cover, remove from heat and set aside. Boil the gnocchi until tender but firm and drain. Toss the gnocchi with the mushroom mixture, add the Parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper to taste and serve immediately.
